title: Implementation of Recommendation Algorithm based on Recommendation Sessions in E-commerce IT System
abstract: This paper presents a study on the implementation of the author's Algorithm of Recommendation Sessions (ARS) in an operational e-commerce information system and analyses the basic parameters of the resulting recommendation system. It begins with a synthetic overview of recommendation systems, followed by a presentation of the proprietary ARS algorithm, which is based on recommendation sessions. A mathematical model of the recommendation session, constructed using graph and network theory, serves as the input for the ARS algorithm. This paper also explores graph structure representation methods and the implementation of a G graph (representing a set of recommendation sessions) in a relational database using the SQL standard. The ARS algorithm was implemented in a working e-commerce information system, leading to the development of a fully functional recommendation system adaptable to various e-commerce IT systems. translated_title: 基于推荐会话的电子商务信息系统中推荐算法的实现
translated_abstract: 本文介绍了在操作性电子商务信息系统中实现作者的推荐会话算法 (ARS) 的研究，并分析了所得推荐系统的基本参数。文章首先综合概述了推荐系统，然后介绍了基于推荐会话的专有ARS算法，该算法基于图和网络理论构建了推荐会话的数学模型，作为ARS算法的输入。本文还探讨了图结构表示方法，并使用SQL标准在关系数据库中实现了代表一组推荐会话的G图。ARS算法在一个操作性电子商务信息系统中得到了实际实现，从而开发出了一个完全适应各种电子商务信息系统的可调整的推荐系统。通过对推荐系统的研究，证明了该算法的有效性。
tldr: 这个论文研究了在电子商务信息系统中实现推荐会话算法 (ARS) 并分析了推荐系统的基本参数。ARS算法通过图和网络理论构建推荐会话的数学模型，并在一个操作性电子商务信息系统中实际实现，展示了算法的有效性。
en_tdlr: This paper explores the implementation of the author's Algorithm of Recommendation Sessions (ARS) in an operational e-commerce information system and analyzes the basic parameters of the resulting recommendation system. The ARS algorithm utilizes a mathematical model based on graph and network theory and is demonstrated to be effective through its implementation in a working e-commerce system.
